pr_title: add user prefs to disable individual aria-live announcements

timeline.message:
add user prefs to disable individual aria-live announcements

- also added new announcement for console output and toggling the Tab Key Always Moves Focus setting

timeline.bodyText: Does this look good at 150% zoom? I'm trying to test that more due to our previously hidden overflow issues.
timeline.author: adamconroy

replies.bodyText: Looks the same (but bigger...). Tried Chrome, Safari, and desktop on Mac.
replies.author: gtritchie
